data.title: Did anyone ever think that Michael C. Hall
data.meta_description: was actually gay? I just wondered if there was ever any gossip.
data.text:
"National Enquirer (May 23, 2011) seems to want to do a gay story on Michael C. Hall, so it settles for saying he's "now hanging out with his gay buddies" in order to be assisted in finding a new girlfriend:

"'Michael has a ton of gay friends and he's having a blast hanging with them until he meets Ms. Right,'said a close source."

They include a note that Hall was seen partying at The Abbey gay bar in WeHo."

But none of you ever saw Michael C. Hall at The Abbey?

I got this private message because I posted on IMDB that I think Michael C. Hall is gay. Actually I got the same message three times...

"Maybe he's gay. That's not the point. I don't care if he's gay or not but since he claims that he isn't gay, that is obviosly the way he wants it.

The point is, he wants people to beleive that he is straight. As a fan of him you should respect that.

If he's gay, then let him be the one to come out with it."

What kind of person post something like this? I simply said I'm a fan and I think he's gay.

To send it to me once, is one thing but to send the message three times (for no reason), it makes me a little angry.

His marriage broke up because of his affair with a guest actress on Dexter. Then even before his divorce was complete he was with some (female) makeup artist on set.

The fraus on gossip sites went insane with rage at how his wife (Jennifer Carpenter)had stood by him through his cancer and the first thing he did, as soon as he was physically able, was to cheat on her at her place of work. It was an utter shit storm considering hes just a cable TV actor.

So yeah, I'ld bet my limbs that he is a gay-friendly, straight slut.
